mapper.update: update problem set name=#{name}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, unit=#{unit}, problemType=#{problemType}, answer=#{answer}, remark=#{remark}, time=#{time}, unitName=#{unitName}, selectKey = #{selectKey}, type = #{type} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from problem where unit = #{id}
select count(*) from problem where unit = -1 and selectKey like #{remark}
select count(*) from problem where unit != -1 and selectKey like #{remark}
